articles.description: The Western Bulldogs pip the Adelaide Crows by the barest of margins, while Collingwood and the Brisbane Lions enjoy their respective wins.
articles.content: The Western Bulldogs withstood a furious second-half revival from Adelaide to upset the previously unbeaten Crows by one point and break their road drought in a massive AFLW boilover at Norwood Oval.… [+5058 chars]
